name: Ext_R2_CarePlan_ac_reference
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.CarePlan.activity.reference for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents CarePlan.activity.reference from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/CarePlan|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Activity details defined in specific resource
element.definition: The details of the proposed activity represented in a specific resource.
element.comment: `CarePlan.activity.reference` maps to R4 `CarePlan.activity.reference`. Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ProcedureRequest)` has no mapping Type `Reference(http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ReferralRequest)` has no mapping So is mapped as RelatedTo.
